__e: I haven't had a dad for 13 years, Ward, and by some miracle, he's... he's here.
My name is not Ward, and you and I were not friends last time I looked.
Ward was sent back in time on some history-altering mission that he failed to accomplish, ending up in prison.
That's what Ward used to kill the judge.
Ward did an amazing thing, yes, but it wasn't Ward by my side in that lab, searching for a cure.
- Ward hurt someone I care about.
Ward should never have had the chance to do what he did.
You see, in his mind, if he wasn't Peter Ward, he couldn't have killed his wife and family.
For whatever reason, Ward never lied to me.
